welcome_message_body: Welcome to Aomori, Japan, known for its vibrant Nebuta Festival and delicious local cuisine. Get ready to explore the city's cultural charm and stunning landscapes – we hope you enjoy your time here!

restaurants.name: 五代目カネシメ蕎麦処 柿崎
restaurants.description: 五代目カネシメ蕎麦処 柿崎 is a soba restaurant located in 青森市.

restaurants.name: 青森魚菜センター
restaurants.description: 青森魚菜センター is a donburi restaurant located in 青森市.

restaurants.name: Aji no Sapporo Onishi (味の札幌 大西)
restaurants.description: Aji no Sapporo Onishi (味の札幌 大西) is a ramen restaurant located in 青森市.

restaurants.name: 王味
restaurants.description: 王味 is a chinese restaurant located in 青森市.

restaurants.name: 丸青食堂
restaurants.description: 丸青食堂 is a seafood restaurant located in 青森市.
restaurants.address: 新町1-3-7 (アウガ B1F), 青森市, 青森県, 030-0801

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Aomori Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for international flights, equipped with customs and immigration facilities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
